page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content: In l984 the Devon General bus stopped coming through the village. It went from Newton Abbot to Teignmouth and back once a day. Now there is a black and white mini bus that goes to Torquay, Newton Abbot & Teignmouth and passes through Maidencombe, Stokeinteignhead and Combeinteignhead.There is approximately one trip in each direction each day. Torquay Travel take the secondary school children to Teignmouth High School each day. This chart shows the transport owned by 16 families. cars owned Number of families NO CARS. 1 ONE CAR. 8 TWO CARS. 6 MORE THAN 2 CARS. 1 MOTORCYCLES. 6 VAN/TRUCK. 5
